message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $14,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 represents the value I see in it, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. I believe this offer still reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,500?
